metadata.title: CVE-2021-41116 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Composer is an open source dependency manager for the PHP language. Inaffected versions windows users running Composer to install untrusteddependencies are subject to command injection and should upgrade theircomposer version. Other OSs and WSL are not affected. The issue has beenresolved in composer versions 1.10.23 and 2.1.9. There are no workaroundsfor this issue.

criterions.comment: composer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
